title: These were the 10 most-played demos on Steam this month
description: A survival RPG, indie Japanese racing game, and cozy MMO top the list.

title: Harebrained Schemes is independent again: Paradox parts ways with the studio less than a week after confirming major layoffs earlier this year
description: Paradox and Harebrained say the split was a mutual decision.

title: Post Malone is coming to Apex Legends for 'two weeks of mayhem,' may God help us all
description: The singer teased some kind of collaboration with Respawn coming in November.

title: Elite Dangerous studio Frontier Developments announces layoffs 'following a period of disappointing financial performance'
description: Frontier Developments is the latest to lay off employees, following what it said was a "challenging" year.

title: Dev says CD Projekt morale 'took a significant hit' after Cyberpunk's launch, but it won't repeat mistakes with the next Witcher
description: Colin Walder says CDP isn't as crunchy as it used to be.

title: I'm enjoying my second playthrough of Lords of the Fallen way more, and I'm kinda mad about it
description: Round two.

title: Fortnite now has a playable 'reimagining' of Alan Wake so you can get caught up on events before Alan Wake 2 arrives
description: Alan Wake: Flashback is a singleplayer game-within-a-game that speedruns the original tale of the troubled author and his missing wife.

title: Diablo 4 boss loot tables: Where to farm each Unique
description: Your one-stop shop of who drops what.

title: You know SSDs are super cheap at the moment, right? These are the good times, but as production gets cut chip prices will rise
description: With Black Friday approaching, prices may be at their lowest for some time.

title: Valve doesn't sell ad space on Steam so it can make room for surprise hits: 'We don't think Steam should be pay-to-win'
description: "We're surprised all the time" by which games take off, says Steam's Erik Peterson.

title: Final Fantasy 14 players interviewed over 80 of their fellow adventurers to craft a heartwarming first-timer's guide to roleplaying with anxiety
description: All it's missing is the words 'DON'T PANIC' on the cover.

title: How one gun company partnered with Call of Duty to attract 'young potential shooters'
description: Newly released documents from a firearms conglomerate show how the arms industry uses games to market its wares.

title: Intel Core i9 14900K review
description: Fast, powerful, and just a bit boring.

title: How to get an environmental kill in Assassin's Creed Mirage
description: Keep your hands clean as you take out your targets.

title: AMD yeets its latest GPU driver in response to Anti-Lag+ causing bans in Counter-Strike 2
description: Well, that's one way to solve the problem, I guess.

title: Arcane is officially canon, and from now on League of Legends lore is going to stop contradicting itself all over the place, say Riot
description: "The essence of what makes a champion who they are will be reflected across everything Riot makes."

title: After saying 'We've been spending way more money than we earn', Epic turns on the money hose to lure game devs into releasing their golden oldies on the Epic Games Store
description: Devs, Epic wants your good old games.

title: Power-hungry Baldur's Gate 3 player stacks Karlach with enlargement magic until she's a 20ft tall, 5-ton giantess who could kill a dragon by jumping on it
description: But can we go… bigger?

title: GTA Online's Halloween event makes a fan rumour real and gives one of its protagonists a last goodbye
description: This is like when they added Bigfoot.

title: My V in Cyberpunk 2077 has absolutely no game at all, and I kind of love him for it
description: 'Ma'm, I'm sure you'd be cosier with your shoes off'—Night City's premier mercenary.

title: Asus adds new DDR5 overclocking option to Z790 ROG motherboards for hunting down more fps and better stability
description: You'll need to use DRAM that's on the supported list too, though.

title: Wordle today: Hint and answer #850 for Tuesday, October 17
description: Trouble solving today's Wordle? Here's the help you need.
